column1: Little Goat Diner////I was overwhelmed by their food choices
column2: so I decided to ask the waitress her top choices. My eyes kept glancing at their apple granola pancakes (and I'm salivating just thinking about it) I was happy to hear that was her top choice
column4: it was the best pancakes I've ever had. Â I don't even know where to begin -- the crunchy tasty granola on top...the fluffy thick pancakes
column6: it was that good and I will get it again when I come back.
